metadata.Title: CVE-2021-27803 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: A vulnerability was discovered in how p2p/p2p_pd.c in wpa_supplicant before 2.10 processes P2P (Wi-Fi Direct) provision discovery requests. It could result in denial of service or other impact (potentially execution of arbitrary code), for an attacker within radio range.

criterions.comment: wpa: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
wpa: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
